event.title: The FSFE Community Meeting 2019 in Bolzano, Italy

body.p: The FSFE will run its annual community meeting in 2019 in cooperation with the SFScon, one of Europeâ€™s most established annual conferences on Free Software happening annually in November in Bolzano, Italy. On Saturday, November 16, in the morning there will be a public fsfe-track and our internal workshops and sessions during the afternoon. In the evening there will a social gathering. Find all up-to-date information on the dedicated wiki-page.
